message: The 'Welcome' thread is for general discussion, but if you have an idea, a request, etc, it'd probably be better as a new topic. Just think of this as a forum, like any other!
Me too, so start discussing general stuff already ;-)
I just finished watching the 1999 film Alice in Wonderland. I liked it!
@Marein That's my favorite adaptation of Alice in Wonderland, loved it as a kid

It's quite good. The visualisations of most scenes and characters are really nicely done, and it has a rich and talented cast. The lines that aren't taken directly from the book are actually clever and fun (as opposed to what's often seen). The only thing that doesn't stand out for me so much is the musical score, which is a bit bland in my opinion - except for the songs, which are pretty nice!
Im still not sure why we dont have a bulletin forums board. I mean what if there are multiple topics that cover roughly the same idea? Unless you can group posts, it may appear messy in the future...
